title: CG Core mappings
description: Attributes for describing data objects based on a combination of CG Core and Dublin Core schemas

properties.help_tip: Enter a type for your information product.
properties.label: Type

properties.help_tip: If there is an opportunity to refine your type with an item of the subtype list, you may want to choose a subtype (this is optional). In such case the metadata requirements of the subtype will apply. What is called "subtype" can have the character of an attribute, such as "internal", "template" or "interactive" which tells the user more about the kind of usage.
properties.label: Subtype

properties.help_tip: Please specify if the document is peer-reviewed or not.
properties.label: Peer-reviewed

properties.help_tip: Please pick the file type.
properties.label: File format

properties.help_tip: Please type the title of the information product.
properties.label: Title

properties.help_tip: Please describe in few words the content of the information product and where necessary the methodology applied.
properties.label: Description

properties.help_tip: Please add keywords describing the subject of the information product.
properties.label: Subject

properties.help_tip: Please add Agrovoc keywords describing the subject of the information product.
properties.label: Agrovoc subject

properties.help_tip: Please give the name and check the correct spelling.
properties.label: Creator

properties.help_tip: Please give an ORCID identifier of that creator.
properties.label: Creator Id

properties.help_tip: Please note the organization the creator was affiliated with at time of creation.
properties.label: Creator affiliation

properties.help_tip: Please add the publisher. Usually a commercial publisher (like "Elsevier") or the institute of the main creator (like "IFPRI").
properties.label: Publisher

properties.help_tip: Please add the Project name which is responsible for the creation of the information product.
properties.label: Project

properties.help_tip: Please add the Project Lead Center of the CRP (if applicable).
properties.label: Project Lead Center

properties.help_tip: Please add the name of Partner (either organization or name). Whenever possible, use official identifier like ORCID numbers for a person or ISNI for an organization.
properties.label: Partner Institute in the Project

properties.help_tip: Please pick from the list the CRP name under which the information product was created.
properties.label: CGIAR Research Program

properties.help_tip: Please pick from the list the name of the donor of the project.
properties.label: Donor

properties.help_tip: Please add the contact point for this information product. Tip: use a department rather than an individual; this field is intended to provide a point of contact for anyone who has questions or needs further guidance about the dataset or information product connected to the record.
properties.label: Contact point

properties.help_tip: Please add the E-Mail address of the chosen contact point.
properties.label: Contact email

properties.help_tip: Please pick the date of creation. This day marks the start of the embargo period.
properties.label: Creation date

properties.help_tip: Please pick the end date of the embargo period according to the applicable data sharing policy.
properties.label: Embargo End Date

properties.help_tip: Please pick from the list the acronyms of the language contained in the information product (Default="English"). Use "Artificial languages" in case of a programming language and "No linguistic content" for an information product without linguistic content. Select "Uncoded languages" for languages without an ISO code.
properties.label: Language

properties.help_tip: Please add an identifier of this information product. This may be a handle, DOI, ISSN, ISBN or the like.
properties.label: Identifier

properties.help_tip: Please write the text that you want the user to cite this document.
properties.label: Citation text

properties.help_tip: Please add the type of identifier
properties.label: Type of identifier

properties.help_tip: Please add the original journal or other type of material where an item was originally published, for example a journal title if the information product described is a journal article.
properties.label: Source document

properties.help_tip: Here you can give any more citation relevant details how the item was published.
properties.label: How publish

properties.help_tip: Please add the title of the larger whole containing this item. Example: a booktitle if the item described is a book chapter.
properties.label: Book title

properties.help_tip: Please ad the chapter name or section number.
properties.label: Chapter name

properties.help_tip: Please add the page or pages of the reference.
properties.label: Page(s)

properties.help_tip: Please add the volume.
properties.label: Volume

properties.help_tip: Please add the number of the periodical or series.
properties.label: Number

properties.help_tip: Please add the series name.
properties.label: Series

properties.help_tip: Please add the edition name if applicable.
properties.label: Edition

properties.help_tip: You may want to add any notes to the information product citation.
properties.label: Notes

properties.help_tip: Here, you can describe relations to other information products. This helps finding and re-using content and hence increases the citation rate.
properties.label: Relation

properties.help_tip: If the information product as other related information products with the same content but different format, those can be specified by name or identifier.
properties.label: has format

properties.help_tip: If the information product is in a different format of an original, the original one can be specified here by name or identifier.
properties.label: is Format of

properties.help_tip: If the information product is part of a larger whole, specify this container name or even better give the identifier.
properties.label: has Part

properties.help_tip: If the information product contains part, you can specify this parts names or even better give the identifiers.
properties.label: is Part of

properties.help_tip: If the information product is version of another information product, specify this other information product name or even better give the link in form of a handle or DOI.
properties.label: has Version

properties.help_tip: If the information product contains part, you can specify this parts names or even better give the identifying handle or DOI.
properties.label: is Version of

properties.help_tip: If the information product conforms to a certain information product such as a standard, please specify this information product name or even better give the identifying link in form of a handle or DOI.
properties.label: conforms to

properties.help_tip: If the information product replaces another information product, please specify the replaced information product name or even better give the identifying link in form of a handle or DOI.
properties.label: replaces

properties.help_tip: If this information product is replaced by another information product, please specify the replacing information product name or even better give the identifying link in form of a handle or DOI.
properties.label: is replaced by

properties.help_tip: If this information product references another information product, please specify the referenced information product name or even better give the identifying link in form of a handle or DOI.
properties.label: references

properties.help_tip: If this information product is referenced by another information product, please specify the referenced information product name or even better give the identifying link in form of a handle or DOI.
properties.label: is referenced by

properties.help_tip: If this information product requires another information product, please specify the required information product name or even better give the identifying link in form of a handle or DOI.
properties.label: requires

properties.help_tip: If this information product is required by another information product, please specify that information product name or even better give the identifying link in form of a handle or DOI.
properties.label: is required by

properties.help_tip: If this information product is containing the metadata for another information product, please specify that described information product name or even better give the identifying link in form of a handle or DOI.
properties.label: is metadata for

properties.help_tip: If this information product uses another information product to store its metadata, please specify that information product name or even better give the identifying link in form of a handle or DOI.
properties.label: has metadata for

properties.help_tip: Please add the editor name or identifier.
properties.label: Editor(s)

properties.help_tip: Please add the name or identifier of the hosting institute of the activity described.
properties.label: Hosting Institution(s)

properties.help_tip: Please add the name or identifier of the project leader.
properties.label: Project Leader

properties.help_tip: Please add the name or identifier of the producer(s).
properties.label: Producer(s)

properties.help_tip: Please add the name or identifier of the data analyst(s).
properties.label: Data Analyst(s)

properties.help_tip: Please add the name or identifier of the supervisor(s).
properties.label: Supervisor(s)

properties.help_tip: Please add the name or identifier of any relevant service provider.
properties.label: Service Provider(s)

properties.help_tip: Please add the name or identifier of the geoinformation specialist involved in producing the information product.
properties.label: Geoinformation Specialist(s) involved

properties.help_tip: Please add the name or identifier of the translator(s) if applicable.
properties.label: Translator(s)

properties.help_tip: Please add the name or identifier of any other relevant contributor.
properties.label: Other contributors

properties.help_tip: Please add some rights information about the information product.
properties.label: Rights

properties.help_tip: Please pick the license.
properties.label: License

properties.help_tip: If there are any rights specifications that goes beyond the license and the terms of use, please specify them here in freetext. (Examples: "copyright - all rights reserved" (if no license applies), or you may need to give a permission statement with an e-mail of the permitting body)
properties.label: Rights statement

properties.help_tip: If there are terms of use other or beyond the license terms, please specify them here. (Examples: "non-commercial educational use only", or "Re-use (no translations)" )
properties.label: Terms of use

properties.help_tip: Please add the official copyright holder.
properties.label: Copyright holder

properties.help_tip: Please add a target audience if applicable.
properties.label: Target audience

properties.help_tip: Please add the name of the event.
properties.label: Event name

properties.help_tip: Please pick the best fitting event type.
properties.label: Event type

properties.help_tip: Please pick the start date of the event.
properties.label: Event start date

properties.help_tip: Please describe the temporal and spatial coverage.
properties.label: coverage

properties.help_tip: Please pick one or more international regions the information product relates to.
properties.label: supernational region

properties.help_tip: Please pick one or more countries the information product relates to.
properties.label: Country

properties.help_tip: Please pick one or more national administrative units the information product relates to.
properties.label: Administrative Unit

properties.help_tip: Please pick one or more agro-ecological zones the information product is valid for.
properties.label: Agro-Ecological Zone (FAO)

properties.help_tip: Please describe the chronological validity
properties.label: Chronological validity

properties.help_tip: Please pick the coverage date if a single one.
properties.label: Coverage date

properties.help_tip: Please pick start and end date of validity if it is a period.
properties.label: Chronological Start/End

properties.help_tip: Please give the latitude coordinate of the geospatial point(s).
properties.label: Latitude (DD)

properties.help_tip: Please give the longitudinal coordinate of the geospatial point(s).
properties.label: Longitude (DD)
